thread.title: AIG Advisor Group Set to Host ConnectED 2015 in San Antonio
thread.title_full: AIG Advisor Group Set to Host ConnectED 2015 in San Antonio

author: Ryan Hall
title: AIG Advisor Group Set to Host ConnectED 2015 in San Antonio
text:
AIG Advisor Group , one of the largest independent broker-dealer networks in the nation, will host its annual conference, ConnectED , in San Antonio, September 28-October 1, 2015 at the Henry B. Gonzalez Convention Center. This event is AIG Advisor Group’s cornerstone educational and networking conference, offering the firm’s nearly 6,000 advisors the opportunity to gain insight in financial planning, practice management and development, investment products, technology, operations, and compliance and regulatory procedures. ConnectED 2015 will feature more than 120 educational sessions on a range of topics chosen to reflect the most current industry trends, best practices, products and policies. ConnectED 2015’s keynote speakers include Malcolm Gladwell , journalist and best-selling author, and Peter H. Diamandis , engineer, physician, author, Chairman/CEO of the X Prize Foundation and Executive Chairman of Singularity. Erica McGinnis, President and CEO of AIG Advisor Group, will also be a featured speaker. Advisors will have the unique opportunity to participate in 50-minute Business Consultation Sessions at this year’s conference, during which they will meet with subject experts, both internal and external, to identify how to best integrate and expand the use of various business tools and technology in their practices. AIG Advisor Group is also offering advisors the opportunity to earn numerous continuing education credits at the event.
The conference will feature topical breakout sessions on key practice management and industry topics including:
The Washington Update: An overview of the political environment, perspective legislation and strategies for investment and retirement planning Becoming a better CEO of your business with the help of AIG Advisor Group’s exclusive Advisor Business Intelligence Buying and Selling a Financial Services Business Working with Female Clients: How to attract and retain female investors Intergenerational wealth transfer: retaining clients through generations
“We’re incredibly excited about this year’s national conference,” said McGinnis. “We have developed ConnectED to give our broker-dealers and their advisors exclusive access to resources and educational sessions designed to help boost the growth of their practices.”
McGinnis, the presidents of AIG Advisor Group’s four broker-dealers and advisors engaged in the firm’s wide range of corporate initiatives will be available for interviews throughout the conference. For all media inquiries, please contact KCD Public Relations .
About AIG Advisor Group
AIG Advisor Group, Inc. is the holding company for a network of independent broker-dealers that is among the largest in the United States. The four broker-dealers that comprise AIG Advisor Group – FSC Securities Corporation, Royal Alliance Associates, Inc., SagePoint Financial, Inc. and Woodbury Financial Services, Inc., are Registered Investment Advisors and members of FINRA and SIPC. A wholly owned subsidiary of American International Group, Inc., AIG Advisor Group fosters the spirit of entrepreneurship and independence exemplified by its nearly 6,000 affiliated independent financial advisors across the US. For more information, please visit http://www.advisorgroup.com .
